scripts.build: npm -s run build-cdk && npm -s run build-auth-lambda && npm -s run build-handler-lambda
scripts.build-auth-lambda: rm -rf build/auth-lambda && mkdir -p build/auth-lambda && cp -r code/auth-lambda/src build/auth-lambda/
scripts.build-handler-lambda: rm -rf build/handler-lambda && mkdir -p build/handler-lambda && pip install --platform manylinux2014_x86_64  --only-binary=:all: --target=build/handler-lambda -r code/handler-lambda/requirements.txt && cp -r code/handler-lambda/src build/handler-lambda/
